mapper.delete: DELETE FROM subscription WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND CHNL_ID=#{chnlId}
mapper.select: SELECT se.SER_TTL, p.POST_TTL, p.POST_SB_TTL, p.POST_THUMN_PATH, u.USER_IMG_PATH, u.NIC, p.POST_INQR_CNT, p.POST_LIK_CNT, p.POST_PBLC_DTM, p.POST_ID, c.CHNL_URI, c.CHNL_ID FROM subscription s INNER JOIN post p ON s.CHNL_ID = p.CHNL_ID LEFT JOIN series se ON p.SER_ID = se.SER_ID INNER JOIN channel c ON p.CHNL_ID = c.CHNL_ID INNER JOIN user u ON c.CRT_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE s.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY p.POST_PBLC_DTM DESC;
